channel.title: Shops! (read! please!)(rep ++!)
channel.description: i was trying to add an item to my barb assault shop. i have 3 items in the shop already but i want to add more. but when i put in the codes and everything and compile it and restart server it does not show.... but if i try to change 1 of the 3 item's that are already inside the shop it lets me.. anyone know the problem? if you help me i give you rep++ ;D

item.title: Shops! (read! please!)(rep ++!)
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Well, I didn’t post that to show you how to change the stock. I posted that to show you how to add more items, as that’s your problem, isn’t it? Just make another set and follow as I explained, Item Amount Item Amount. And you have to tab between them too.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops! (read! please!)(rep ++!)
item.dc:creator: @alanpwns alanpwns
item.description:
@alanpwns wrote:

no it does not help lol. i know how to make them have more stock.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops! (read! please!)(rep ++!)
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

  1. You can’t rep.
  2. Saying you’ll reward is against the rules.

Your Problem: It goes Item Amount Item Amount. Like this.

1048	100	1050	100

1048 is the partyhat and the 100 is the amount of partyhats in the shop. Same goes for 1050. Also, don’t forget that you need to use tabs and not spaces if you didn’t already know that. This may not even help your problem, but tell me if it does…

Read full topic
